name: scratchfuscator
description: Scratch project (.sb3) obfuscator with BST-dispatch CFF, dead code injection, opaque predicates, constant obfuscation, and variable renaming

scripts.build: rollup -c && terser dist/cli.js -o dist/cli.js -c passes=2 -m && terser dist/console-obfuscator.js -o dist/console-obfuscator.js -c passes=2 -m
